title: pen tool in illustrator?
content: any guides or movies online that are good help in teaching the basics?
author: evilfansanfran

comments.content: Veerle’s [Illustration, from sketch to finish](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120150511/http:/veerle.duoh.com/index.php/blog/comments/illustration_from_sketch_to_finish_part_one/) is a wonderful 3-part tutorial in QuickTime screen movie form.

thats exactly what i need, but the page is down.

a movie would be great if anyone has something similar.

Don’t give up - I also had problems and then it loaded.

Nice link Stephen Coles!

peace
Use the Mirror link below the first Download link, nycersalife
i believe [Leslie Cabarga](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Leslie%20Cabarga) goes over this in his [Logo, Font & Lettering Bible](http://web.archive.org/wiki/logo_font_and_lettering_bible).

I’ve videos from total training..they teach everything..not only the pen tool. you’ll become Illustrator master If you buy that kit:)  
 [www.totaltraining.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120150511/http:/www.totaltraining.com/)

Stephen:

Thanks for the Veerle link. It really is wonderful.
